values:
Hi  everyone,
I  know  it's  been  ages since  I  posted  anything  in  my  LJ...  I  thought  I  might  post  something  completely  Random...  I know it's been  almost  2  years  since  the  departure  of  the  original  host  of  The  Price  Is Right   (Bob  Barker)  retired... I  miss  him  hosting  the  show  but  I  am  learning  to  like  Drew  Carey  as  the  host  a little  more  he's  kinda  growing  on  me  I  was  so  upset  he  got  the  job but  oh  well  way  to  go  Drew  keep  the  momentum up  and  you  are  making  Bob  Barker  and  everyone  at  the  network  very  happy..  but  anyways  the  real  reason  I  started  watching  "Price Is  Right"  it's  not  because  of  Drew  Carey**  (**Sorry  Folks  and  Drew  fans) I  watch  it  because  of  the  attractive    announcer  ...  Rich  Fields.  I fell  in  love  with  him  since  he  was  announcing  with  Bob  and  I  love  him more  because  he's  announcing  for  Drew  and  the  fact  I  find  him really  sexy...   I  love  when  he  describes  the  showcases  and  also  when  he  says  the  magic  words  "COME  ON DOWN" !! also  he  has  a nice  smile  and  looks  so  darn  good  in  a  suit and  sadly  he's  married  .. (*Sorry  Ladies  the  sexy  announcer  guy  is  spoken for )  but  I  still  find  him  witty ,  charming  and  sexy  and  he  has  a  great  voice..  and  Christine**(**his wife  is  one  lucky  lady  to  have  such  a  handsome  and  witty  guy  like  Rich  in  her  life)  ..  If  he  was  single  the  ladies  would  be  lining  up  at  CBS  just  for him    to say"Come On  Down,  You  are  The  Next  Contestant  on  "The  Price  Is  Right".  It's  good  to  have  a  crush on  an older man  who's almost  49  years  old  and  is  the  voice  of  The  Price  Is  Right...  you'll understand  when  you  see  how  freaking  "Foxy"  Rich  really  is...  enjoy    !!





also  he's  an  alumi  of  the  University  Of  Florida  and  he's  a  survivor  of  Testicular  Cancer*  (*the  same cancer  that  Lance  Armstrong had or  has  had)  also  in  his  free  time  when  not  working  as  the  announcer  on "Price"  Rich  does  charity  work  for  Cancer  related  Charities.  which  is  really  awesome  and  the  coolest  thing  is  he's a  survivor !!

if  you  feel  ambitious  help out  by  donating  money  or  time  to  charity  organizations  ..every  little  bit  helps  to make  the  world  a  better  place  and  to  help  your  friends  and  family  or  people who  live    states  or  oceans  away  .. 

please  check  out:

www.livestrong.com

and  

please   donate  to  "The  American  Cancer  Society "  and  other  Cancer  related  charities in  your neighborhood  or  state  and  County  so  on.


well I  gotta  call  it  a night   so   thanks  for  your  time!!)


~*Casey*~/RLfanatic4ever
http://rlfanatic4ever.livejournal.com/10665.html

Greetings  all ,
sorry  I  haven't  had  much  time  to  post here  at  LiveJournal  lately  I  was  caught  up  in  Idol Mania  and  also  was caught  up with  hearing  the   great  news  regarding  the  relationship of  George  Clooney  and  his  young  skank  Girlfriend  Sarah  Larson  calling  it  quits  they  been  dating  for  a  year  and  finally  George  came  to  his  senses he  doesn't  wanna  Marry  again.   Also  here  is  something  you  people  who  followed  American  Idol  durning  Season  5  the  guy  who  won  that  season  Taylor  Hicks is  taking  on  dare  i  say  it   Broadway as  the  Teen  Angel  in  the  Revival  of  Grease  starring  the  winners  of   the  reality  show  "Grease  : You're  the  One  That  I  Want" Hicks'  run as  the  role  made  famous  by  the  iconic  Frankie  Avalon  in  the  1978  film  ends  September  7th.  In  September  the  Coen  Brothers  are  at  It  again  with  the  new  film  "Burn  After  Reading"  which  stars  George  Clooney  and  Brad Pitt  .  Joel  and  Ethan  Coen  the  brother  force  behind  the  Best  Picture  winner  "No  Country  For  Old  Men"   and  this  new  flick  due  this September  is  the  third  project  that  the  Coen's  directed  with  Clooney  appearing  in.   The problem  why  Clooney  didin't take  home  Best Actor  at  this  years  Oscars  is  he  was just  too sexy  looking  in  the  Legal  Thriller  Michael  Clayton..  maybe  he  will  garner  another  shot  at  Best  Actor  or  Supporting  Actor  for  this  film.. From looking  at  the  stills  and  the Trailer  the  47 year old  silver  fox  manages  to  keep  his  sexiness  amidst  sporting  multi  colored  scruff  but  who  knows  he's  still  hot!!)

here  is  the  trailer  and  see  for  yourself...!!)  enjoy










Have a  Great  week  and  see ya  on  the other  side!!)

it's  been  like  forever  since  i  posted  anything  in  my  livejournal. nothing  really  new  is  going  on  with  me  lately  but  I  am  really  excited   that    I  maybe  going  to  another  concert  this  summer  but  not in  Baltimore  sadly  but  closer  to  me  with  in  like  20  minutes  from  me  on  July  26th..  I  don't know  when  tickets  will  be  available though. To  cut to  the  chase  of  suspense  I  may be  seeing  Michael  Mcdonald  in  Salamanca, NY.  also  I  am  stoked  about  George Clooney's new flick  Leather  Heads that  will  be  hitting  theaters  nationwide  next  Friday..yay!!  I  Love  George  Clooney  as  much  as I  Love  Taylor  Hicks  and  Rob  Lowe..All  men  are hot  in  my  eyes..

Hope  everyone  is  well  and  I  will  check back  as  soon  as  I  can!!


~*Casey*~(RLFanatic4ever and  a lover  of  Silver  haired  men  mainly  Taylor  Hicks  and  George  Clooney *thud* LOL)

Greetings my fellow lj readers,
I just came  back from one of the most electrifying concerts ever at RamsHead Live. Taylor Hicks , the soulful silver haired Pop/Soul crooner from the heart and soul of Birmingham, Alabama..Rocked out to a sold out crowd in downtown Baltimore. Hicks, 30 sang his classics like "Hell Of A Day" and  "Soul Thing" and some new songs that will be instant classics like  the energetic toe tapper "The Runaround" and the upbeat  Michael Mcdonald - esque    song "Give Me Tonight" ,  The warm fuzzy ballad that was intended for the late Ray Charles  but Taylor gives his magic touch "The Right Place" is an instant classic by that right. also Hicks performed his current radio friendly ballad "Just To Feel That Way" and a cover of  "Naked In The Jungle" made famous by the great Van Morrison was also in the mix .The silver haired crooner came back for the encore wearing a purple Baltimore Ravens jersey.. need I say more!! He was lookin' fantastic and  drenched in sweat. I  wish I could've gotten closer.. but none the less the man was awesome  and sexy!!  The 30 year old  even played the guitar with a strap with the words in silver writing  "Soul Patrol".. How awesome is that!!  I only wish I had the pictures from my brother's girlfiend's phone up  so I can share the pics   even though they are not close up ..but you can still tell it's Taylor!!
there will possibly be picture but not right now or tonight!!

overall his performance was like a soulful spiritual experience.. hope to see him live again!! Taylor was amazing and really , sexy!!  letter grade :A-

Star grade ****1/2 ( Four and a Half stars)...


can't believe my adventure ended and I have to leave 2morrow.. I am happy and sad to leave ,  I hate saying Good Bye!!


there will hopefully be pictures  uploaded soon!!

Take Care... peace love and Soul Patrol!!


~* Casey*~
http://rlfanatic4ever.livejournal.com/9811.html

greetings everyone,
thought i should post another entry for my Live Journal..I'll be at a concert tomorrow night at RamsHead Live in Downtown Baltimore. DownTown Baltimore is gonna be ruled by the Soul Patrol and thier silver haired fearless leader last seasons  American Idol winner Taylor Hicks. Hicks who is now 30 will be "Takin' It To The Streets" of Baltimore  tomorrow evening and wil be performing his originals and throw in a few cover tunes into his Soulful Pop based set list. The Birmingham , Alabama native covered classics ranging from  his biggest musical influnces like Ray Charles, Billy Preston  and one of the most famous Pop/ Rock groups who dove into Pop/Soul because of thier replacement front man who later went on to a budding solo career in 1982. The band I was refering to was The Doobie Brothers and the replacement front man i was talkin' about was Michael McDonald.  
I am too excited I will finally get to see Taylor in person...!!*thud* It's gonna be awesome!!  I promise I will post my review of the concert in my LJ maybe as soon as I get back from the concert ..god hoping I won't be too worn out to post  !! 



 Soul Patrol!!  

too excited!!   Taylor Hicks in person Oh My!! wooooooooooooooo!! *Thud*

thought I should post in this even though it's been awhile. I have great news I am gearing up to go to Baltimore in April to see my beloved Grey Haired American Idol... Taylor Hicks. what a great way to promote him by using my LJ!! His album gone Platinum even though the album is falling on the charts. I hope sales skyrocket after the single hits Radio on January 22nd keep your ears open the song is called "Just To Feel That Way".also good news Rob Lowe is staying on Brothers and Sisters till the End Of The Season and also is  Lowe is  finally doing a voice cameo on the animated Fox comedy Family Guy which will air on Jan.28th  at 9pm.
http://rlfanatic4ever.livejournal.com/8119.html

It's been a long time since I posted in my LJ.  The definate date for Taylor's debut cd is December 5th..we have two months til then .I always listen to the "Original Soulful Silver Fox" Michael McDonald he so reminds me alot of Taylor. It's just an awesome power and glow that surounds him when he sings on stage. I believe Taylor has some mighty big shoes to fill in which he proved he could. The now 30 year old Alabama native garners a certified Gold single with his  Post Idol anthem "Do I Make You Proud" the silver haired Soul man.. deems worthy to make a huge splash in the music world. Hicks is bring us back to a simpler time in Popular Music a feeling  of relaxation and ease that was popular in the mid to late 70's and mid to early 80's called " West Coast" or "California" sound that was brought to light by  artists like  Christopher Cross, Kenny Loggins, Michael McDonald and  Robbie Dupree , many more. The Music industry  is in for a refreshing breath of fresh air  when  Taylor Hicks' major label debut will hit stores.. Hopefully by then "Do I Make You Proud" would be certified Platinum .  Can't wait for his cd to come out. Lets hope it lives up to the hype and expectations we want and Taylor wants us to love.

Taylor can't go wrong when he has the full support from great artists  like  Michael McDonald and John Mayer who contributed songs and  Mayer even co wrote a song with Hicks also. It ought to be good. Taylor is also working with some of the horns from   the amazing  "Tower Of Power". The people  that  Taylor would've loved having met and worked with are  acclaimed drummer of the band Toto , Jeff Porcaro who was dear friend of Michael McDonald .Jeff passed  away in 1992 and he'll be greatly missed. Also acclaimed singer / writer Chuck Sabatino who also passed away ..i don't when he passed though he was also a good friend of Michael McDonald to . Chuck is greatly missed as well and he would 've enjoyed working with Taylor if he was still alive as would Jeff.

 see you on the b-side!! later!!

Greetings everyone,

It's a start of a new month and almost not quite the  end of summer. Thought I should let you all in the know about  the release date for the major label debut cd by the sexy silver haired soulster who won  my heart and everyone elses when he was on American Idol. I'm talking about the sweet southren gentleman with the most distinctive voice and smolderingly sexy charm , charisma. Last but not least the killer dance moves,  Taylor Hicks. The 29 year old Pop / Soul crooner is flattered when people compaire him musically and  vocally to the likes of  Five Time Grammy winner Michael McDonald and the amazing Joe Cocker. The silver haired , brown eyed hottie is still on the road with all the other American Idol finalist through  some point in Fall. Just after being named  the new "Idol" Hicks appeared in an ad spot for auto maker Ford for their  "Model Year End Clearence" the silver haired soulman signed on to do more spots for the car maker ,with a voice and style  so sophisticated just give him an ad campaign with a great song to go with it..he couald sell you anything...heck  even long distance phone plans..like Michael Mcdonald did with MCI in 2003 and also for Verizon/ MCI business this year. Basically Taylor Hicks is this generation's distinctive  voice he's following in great footsteps and making a way for himself to be heard . The 29 year old Birmingham , Alabama native is by all means the next Michael Mcdonald, he wears his heart and soul on his sleeve and shares his love, passion for the music he creates and brings new life to.  

The  Sexy, Soulful  Pop/ Soul crooner's major label debut  is untitled for now but the album is set to be released on November 14th*.  please remember to mark your calendars  for that!!

* the date may change but for all I know its November 14th!!







"Bold... Wins"-  ( Ford print ad)

" Possibilities!!"(  Taylor sings in  the  Ford Tv spot)


*Soul Patrol* wooow!! 

Enjoy!!)

See ya on the B-side!!

~*rlfanatic4ever*~(aka Casey)

I will let everyone know when I get word of its release!! You know me I will be the first one to buy it and let ya'll know what I think of it!!

Greetings one and all,
I haven't be posting much on LJ lately...because I am caught up in "Soul Patrol" Mania!! I really don't  have any new Rob Lowe news except he's working on a new filck in Canada this month ..it's a follow up to the 1999 thriller "Stir Of Echoes" called " Stir Of Echoes : The Dead Speak". Also "Thank You For Smoking" is slated to be on DVD on October 3rd...keep an eye out for that kids!!

Speaking of  the newly named American Idol... Taylor Hicks, His single "Do I Make You Proud"? is still rising on the charts...lets hope it's certified gold before  the silver haired Pop/ Soul crooner's major label Debut  that will soon to be released some point this Fall.  The 29 year old Birmingham, Alabama native graced the cover of People Magazine and also named "Hottest  Single Guy".. the soulfully sexy songster is flattered to be compaired to five time Grammy winner Michael Mcdonald and also has the good looks to easily be mistaken  for  Oscar winner  George Clooney.. I think 2006 belongs to Taylor Hicks and other silver haired celebrities... namely Mr. Clooney and Mr. Mcdonald  also Mr. Anderson Cooper. Hicks is currently on tour with  the 9 other finalists of American Idol...until mid September  or October ...not sure... I will keep you posted on Taylor's Album release date!!  You can also catch Michael Mcdonald on Tour with Steely Dan until Early September.

Take Care!! *Soul Patrol*!!







I Love Taylor Hicks!!!  but  I Love  Rob Lowe*( *Damn He's Married and 42 , has kids but I still love him) I Love  Taylor more than Rob... Taylor is by far sexier than  Rob(lol) ... Aww... I can't say that I love both of them and think both are really sexy... But I am more likely to end up marrying Taylor  instead of Rob Lowe.:) If Taylor was to ever ask me to marry him..my answer would be "Yes" for  sure!!  




*Thud** Love it when he smiles and has a good time.... Taylor is just the greatest!! *Wooooow* *Thud*
http://rlfanatic4ever.livejournal.com/6835.html

Sorry I Haven't posted in my LJ for the last few weeks or maybe months on end. I turned 25 years old last Monday  and My Fave American Idol contestant Taylor Hicks is so much closer to being named "Our Next American Idol" He's kinda a hybrid of  Michael Mcdonald and Joe Cocker...but more like Michael Mcdonald. The 29 year old Birmingham, Alabama native  deserves to be named "American Idol 2006" because he is just the type of musical talent we need right now. Just my opinion. Hicks reminds me of a young Michael Mcdonald minus the facial hair and the blue eyes.. why he reminds me of him "Taylor has this passion and love for the music  that has been passed along to generation to generation".  Hicks  is bringing new life to the style of music that  five time Grammy winner Mcdonald  has done before him, "Blue Eyed Soul" or "Vanilla Soul" , "Pop/Soul". Here is a little fact: Michael Mcdonald was about  29 or 30 when he garnered his first Top 10 hit in 1982 with "I Keep Forgettin' (Everytime You're Near)".I think Taylor Hicks has the "Heart and Soul" and Talent to be our next "Idol". 
One day  Taylor will garner Grammy Gold like one of his major vocal influences, Michael Mcdonald. I will be shocked if Mcdonald now 54 joins  Hicks on stage during the Results night extravaganza. Taylor sang one of the greatest Doobie Brothers songs ever penned by Mcdonald *(*besides "What A Fool Believes" which he co wrote with Kenny Loggins) I am talking about  The Doobies 1976 hit "Takin' It To The Streets"..Hicks recorded it for "The American Idol Season5: Encores" cd out Tuesday.    *Taylor is so In It ..To  Win It*!! *Go Taylor!!


Even famous people watch "American Idol" in an interview with Brooke Anderson at the End Of April. Anderson sat down with Former West Wing star and 80's Sex Symbol , Rob Lowe.  The blonde Headline News Entertaiment Correspondent asked if  the  attractive blue eyed actor now 42,who was dressed in a buttoned down white dress shirt and khaki  pants said he watches the  show  he's addicted  to it . Anderson failed to ask the Sexy star who he was pulling for to win. I hope Lowe  is pulling for Taylor...!! It would be awesome  to see the  42 year old father  of  two sport a shirt that says "Soul Patrol" or "Got Soul". We'll never know we may see Lowe in the audience  during the finale either one of the two nights or both nights at the Kodak. 
 
I am still wondering  who Rob is a fan of  for "American Idol" ? so is everyone else Rob, we are just dying to know if you are a
 "SOUL PATROLLER" or if you "Caught the "McPheever" ". We'll hopefully find out Tuesday or  Wednesday if  the hansome  42 year old actor is a Member of "The Soul Patrol" or not..lets hope he is and if he's gonna be in the audience either night or both nights.

If  anyone is asking "What is the Soul Patrol"? it is a group of Fans who followed Taylor Hicks through his journey on "Idol" and outside of "Idol". 

Maybe there should be a loyal fanbase for Rob Lowe known as "The "Lowe" Patrol"  (lol) ...we'd be pledging our love, loyality and support in whatever the good looking actor does..besides looking perfectly flawless everytime...*guh* who is all with me on this..some one should start a community called "The Lowe Patrol" ...that doesn't sound half bad...maybe I should start a group..named that...!!(heehehehe *squee* lol)

I<3 Rob Lowe!! and I <3 Taylor Hicks!!


well I gotta go!! 

Peace , Love, Lowe and  Soul!!

bye for now!! Love to hear from ya'll soon!!

~*Casey*~(aka rlfanatic4ever)

example lyrics: " You're the breath of life in me..the only one that can set me free./ You have made my soul complete for all time"

Hey..I am happy someone shared their love of  Samuel Norman Seaborn*(*Sam Seaborn) aka Rob Lowe!! That was an awesome LJ..Sam is the Man!! Call Me Crazy  I wrote a "West Wing" Story called "Happy Birthday , CJ",  where i wrote a character based on myself..named Cassie Lembeck..who ended up engaged to Sam. Funny Huh..!! I think Bellanut has a great LJ with her love of Sam!! I Love Both Sam and the actor who brought him to life..Rob Lowe.!!  On other news ..Matthew...I can't spell your last name or the guy from "How To Lose A Guy in10 Days" was named "Sexiest Man Alive" by People Magazine for 2005..how "Overrated" I was so Totally pulling for Rob Lowe to be named that!!
